rev.comment: inappropriate fair use; useful for an article on the book, not the rivalry
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Clean, Old-Fashioned Hate.jpg|thumb|250px|''Clean, Old-Fashioned Hate'', one of the works published on the rivalry, by Bill Cromartie (ISBN 0-93252-064-2)]]
 
'''Clean, Old-Fashioned Hate''' is the nickname given to the [[College rivalry#Southeastern Rivalries|college rivalry]] between the [[Georgia Institute of Technology|Georgia Tech]] [[Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets|Yellow Jackets]] and the [[University of Georgia|Georgia]] [[Georgia Bulldogs|Bulldogs]]. The two schools are separated by {{convert|70|mi|km}} and have been heated rivals since 1893. The two schools, in essence, are not only competing in athletics but are also competing for government and private funding, potential students, and amongst other things academic recognition in the [[Georgia (U.S. state)|State of Georgia]] and the [[United States]].<ref name="more">{{cite news|first=Clark|last=Nelson|url=http://nique.net/issues/2004-11-19/sports/2|title=For Tech fans, victory against UGA means far more than ordinary win|work=[[The Technique]]|date=[[2004-11-19]]|accessdate=2007-05-17}}</ref>
'''Clean, Old-Fashioned Hate''' is the nickname given to the [[College rivalry#Southeastern Rivalries|college rivalry]] between the [[Georgia Institute of Technology|Georgia Tech]] [[Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets|Yellow Jackets]] and the [[University of Georgia|Georgia]] [[Georgia Bulldogs|Bulldogs]]. The two schools are separated by {{convert|70|mi|km}} and have been heated rivals since 1893. The two schools, in essence, are not only competing in athletics but are also competing for government and private funding, potential students, and amongst other things academic recognition in the [[Georgia (U.S. state)|State of Georgia]] and the [[United States]].<ref name="more">{{cite news|first=Clark|last=Nelson|url=http://nique.net/issues/2004-11-19/sports/2|title=For Tech fans, victory against UGA means far more than ordinary win|work=[[The Technique]]|date=[[2004-11-19]]|accessdate=2007-05-17}}</ref>
